革命性的糖尿病护理具有创新的靶标和治疗选择提出了对靶向特定受体和代谢途径的现代药物进行的彻底检查，以进行葡萄糖和脂肪代谢。最近的研究揭示了创新的目标和治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/revolutionized-diabetes-care-care-with-innovativation-targets-and-therapeutic-options.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/revolutionizing-diabetes-care-care-with-innovativation-targets-and-therapeutic-options.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= eafbe92c-f910-4895-83c0-82e82e80be4369b Thu, 30 Jan 2025 20:09:43 -0500 Revolutionizing diabetes care with innovative targets and therapeutic options
阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症与衰老的大脑失败的废物处置有关新的研究发现，随着年龄的增长，蛋白质清除机制下降如何导致阿尔茨海默氏症，帕金森氏症和其他神经退行性疾病，这给有针对性的疗法放缓或预防这些疾病的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/alzheimere28099s-and-parkinsone28099s-c-ninked to-aving-aging-graine28099s-failing-failing-bailing-waste-disposal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/alzheimere28099s-and-parkinsone28099s-linked to-aging-aging-aging-aging-aging-aging-aving-aving-aving-braine28099s-failing-failing-waste-disposal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54E10CA2-ACB9-4F72-BE97-D0402641C65B Thu, 30 Jan 2025 20:06:00 -0500 Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s linked to aging brain’s failing waste disposal
Protac Technology为治疗耐Cantration的前列腺癌提供了希望宣布了Acta Materia Medica Journal的新出版物。前列腺癌（PRCA）是影响男性的最普遍的泌尿生殖器癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/protac-technology offers-hope-for-treating-castration-castration-castration-prostate-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/protac-technology offers-hope-for-treating-castration-castration-castration-prostate-prostate-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6d1ec19-50ab-441e-ba28-94b7444a0bd94 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 20:02:38 -0500 PROTAC technology offers hope for treating castration-resistant prostate cancer
新的轻度控制工具可在活细胞中提供实时蛋白质控制Umeå大学的一个研究小组开发了新的先进的光控制工具，该工具可以实时对蛋白质进行精确控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/new-light-controlls-tools-tools-offer-real time-prote-protein-controte-controte-controte-control in-living-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/new-light-controlls-tools-tools-julls-offer-real time-prote-protein-protein-controte-control in-living-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bba14b3-7b44444f0d-a819-a819-ab10f161eea8 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 19:59:00 -0500 New light-controlled tools offer real-time protein control in living cells
寨卡病毒操纵人皮肤以吸引蚊子并提升传播新研究显示，寨卡病毒劫持了人类宿主的皮肤，以发送化学信号，以吸引更多的蚊子进一步感染和传播疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/zika-virus-manipulates-human-skin-skin-skin-skin-tox-mosquitoes-and-mosquitoes-and-boost-transmission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/zika-virus-manipulates-human-skin-skin-skin to-attract-mosquitoes-and-boost-transmission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2c9a3b2-83ee-4641-BE3D-08133F211B80 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 19:52:00 -0500 Zika virus manipulates human skin to attract mosquitoes and boost transmission
研究突出显示孕妇的癌症诊断延迟根据萨里大学的一项新研究，有时可能会误诊为正常妊娠相关的变化，在某些情况下，在某些情况下会导致治疗延迟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/study-highlights-delayed-cancer-diangnoses-ingnats-in-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/study-highlights-delayed-cancer-diangnoses-ingnoses-in-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=236fdb4e-bccd-4df2-b962-2353bbf3dbe5 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 19:47:00 -0500 Study highlights delayed cancer diagnoses in pregnant women
您的免疫系统如何年龄：科学家揭示一生中的关键变化科学家绘制了人类免疫系统从出生到老年的演变，揭示了影响健康，抗病性和衰老的关键变化。他们的免疫年龄模型可以帮助预测免疫健康并指导早期干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/how-your-immmune-system-system-ages-scientists-reveal-key-key-key-changes-changes-over-a-a-lifetime.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/how-your-immmune-system-ages-ages-scientist-scientists-reveal-key-key-changes-changes-over-a-a-lifetime.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc970b3a-8aa7-4218-4218-ACCC-343BB2502E0C Thu, 30 Jan 2025 19:25:00 -0500 How your immune system ages: Scientists reveal key changes over a lifetime
尽管正在进行疫苗接种工作，欧洲仍面临着脊髓灰质炎的风险根据欧洲疾病预防与控制中心（ECDC）董事Pamela Rendi Wagner和世界卫生组织（谁是谁）的社论，近几个月来，近几个月来，近几个几个月来，欧洲几个几个月中的脊髓灰质炎病毒检测异常高得多。 ）欧洲地区主任汉斯·克洛格（Hans Kluge），该区域发表于欧洲监视。 Rendi-Wagner和Kluge警告说，“没有小儿麻痹症的未来仍然是我们的目标，但绝不是确定的。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/europe-faces-growing-rowning-risk-of-polio-depite-gongoing-vaccination-vaccination-efforts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/europe-faces-rowing-rowing-rowing-rowing-polio-polio-despite-gongoing-vaccination-vaccination-efforts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10af0bf1-6960-4A39-995C-598683F4B129 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 12:22:15 -0500 Europe faces growing risk of polio despite ongoing vaccination efforts

ALPK2被确定为有前途的新治疗靶点用于治疗心力衰竭Nagoya大学医学院心脏病学系的Tatsuya Yoshida，Mikito Takefuji和Toyoaki Murohara在心脏病学系中确定了一种专门表达的酶，Alpha-kinase 2（Alpk2）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/alpk2-sideifud-as-promising-new-therapeitic-target-for-treatment-for-treatment-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/alpk2-sideified-and-as-promisish-new-therapeitic-therapeutic-target-for-treatment-forefor-shread-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A97B531F-DB2B-4E72-8F2C-77F74036974C Thu, 30 Jan 2025 12:09:22 -0500 ALPK2 identified as promising new therapeutic target for treatment of heart failure
